article_metadata.title: Gov. Rick Scott sparks resistance, confusion with call for a ‘continuation’ budget | Miami Herald

og.description: The Senate and House are steadfast about adopting a budget in June despite Gov. Rick Scott’s position on a “continuation budget.”
og.title: Gov. Rick Scott sparks resistance, confusion with call for a ‘continuation’ budget
